summary: Not working and unable to uninstall as well

description:
The app does what it says: it provides a graphical interface to configure the "libinput-gestures" package. So make sure that you follow the docs on installing all dependencies and don't forget to reboot after that.

Unfortunately the app gives no guidance on configuring the gestures, so you have to dig yourself through the libinput-gestures docs to find out. And if you already do this, it is easy enough to configure the package directly without the GUI.

As this app is still in 0.3.0, I still see potential for this app. If it would give more guidance in configuring gestures (instead of just providing a text field to type in commands) and if it would come with all dependencies, this could be the perfect solution for adding gestures to Ubuntu.
summary: Does what it says but needs user-focused documentation

description: I can't uninstall this with any of the known methods
